metadata.title: CVE-2024-4006 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 16.7 before 16.9.6, all versions starting from 16.10 before16.10.4, all versions starting from 16.11 before 16.11.1 where personalaccess scopes were not honored by GraphQL subscriptions

criterions.comment: gitlab-agent package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
